name: Mitigation Playbook for Malicious Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker executed a malicious PowerShell script to exfiltrate sensitive data from the organization's internal network.

parallel--d47e3e3d-b775-4ba5-bf2c-9e5d92.name: Mitigation Actions
parallel--d47e3e3d-b775-4ba5-bf2c-9e5d92.description: Execute mitigation actions in parallel to address the malicious script.

action--e4b15320-c3b4-4046-8b53-10d12300.name: Kill malicious PowerShell process
action--e4b15320-c3b4-4046-8b53-10d12300.description: Terminate the malicious PowerShell process that is executing.

action--59f7d763-17f5-487e-b8f6-235eacf2.name: Block outbound connection to malicious IP
action--59f7d763-17f5-487e-b8f6-235eacf2.description: Block any outbound connections to known malicious IPs.

action--94e4be38-0f79-4e8f-bf0c-7c57f19e.name: Run antivirus scan on affected host
action--94e4be38-0f79-4e8f-bf0c-7c57f19e.description: Perform a recursive antivirus scan on the affected host to ensure no threats remain.

while-condition--da885e68-23aa-4a73-ba91.name: Repeat Antivirus Scan
while-condition--da885e68-23aa-4a73-ba91.description: Continue scanning until no threats are found.
